item.title: What Does It Take to Create a Garment? Part 2.
item.description: If you’ve just joined the reading, please, visit the first part page. It tells about inspiration, ideas, ways of getting a pattern & measurements. If you please, I’ll continue. 4. Pattern A pattern is the template, the blueprint, from which the parts of a garment - like sleeves, front & back bodice, collar, etc. - are placed & traced onto fabric before being cut out and assembled. Patterns may be drafted manually or digitally.
